Introduction to rtaxref

Source: vignettes/rtaxref.Rmd
rtaxref.Rmd
library(rtaxref)
#> ðŸ›‘Important September 2025 UpdateðŸ›‘
#>    The Natural History Museum of Paris has been hacked, TaxREF went offline, including its API
#>    So, for now rtaxref wonâ€™t work
#>       To see how to circumvent the issue refer to our README page: https://rekyt.github.io/rtaxref/

rtaxref queries the API of the French Taxonomic Referential (TAXREF). This referential contains much taxonomical information as well as many other kinds of information (occurrence in French territories, conservation statuses, etc.).
